p:
In our previous work we have analysed the alcoholic extracts of W. filifera seeds, using HPLC–DAD–ESI/MS. We have highlighted that the composition of these W. filifera seeds consisting in flavan-3-ol. B-type procyanidin dimers (B1-B4) were among the main phenolic compounds in the extracts of W. filifera seeds
27 . In this study, through UHPLC-DAD-ESI/MS analysis, three phenolic compounds have been identified, catechin, protocatechuic acid, and p-hydroxybenzoic acid, in addition to those identified in our previous report.
